formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'IFTIME' =-
[Syntax] IFTIME(<timespec>?[<true>][:<false>])
[Synopsis] Temporal Conditional: Returns the data following '?' if true else the data following ':'
[Description] Not available

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ IFTIME(<timespec>?[<true>][:<false>])
[Synopsis] - Temporal Conditional: Returns the data following '?' if true else the data following ':' + Temporal Conditional: Returns the data following '?' if true, else the data following ':'
[Description] Not available
